content:
Congratulations on your new TV and gaming console! I'd be happy to help you set up your new TV and connect it to your gaming console.

To connect your gaming console to your new 4K TV, you'll need a few cables and some basic knowledge of the TV's settings. Here's a step-by-step guide to get you started:

**Required cables:**

1. HDMI cable (usually comes with the gaming console or TV)
2. Power cord for the gaming console

**Step 1: Unbox and physically connect the gaming console to the TV**

1. Unbox your gaming console and locate the HDMI port on the back or side of the console.
2. Locate an available HDMI port on your TV. Most modern TVs have multiple HDMI ports, usually labeled as HDMI 1, HDMI 2, HDMI 3, etc.
3. Connect one end of the HDMI cable to the gaming console's HDMI port.
4. Connect the other end of the HDMI cable to an available HDMI port on your TV.

**Step 2: Power on the TV and gaming console**

1. Plug in the power cord for your gaming console and turn it on.
2. Turn on your TV using the remote control.

**Step 3: Select the correct HDMI input on your TV**

1. Using your TV's remote control, navigate to the Input or Source menu.
2. Select the HDMI port you connected the gaming console to (e.g., HDMI 1, HDMI 2, etc.). You may need to cycle through the inputs to find the correct one.

**Step 4: Configure the TV settings for 4K resolution**

1. Once you've selected the correct HDMI input, navigate to the TV's Picture or Video settings menu.
2. Look for the "Resolution" or "Video Mode" setting and set it to "4K" or "2160p" (depending on your TV's options).
3. You may also need to set the "HDR" (High Dynamic Range) setting to "On" or "Auto" to take full advantage of your TV's 4K capabilities.

**Step 5: Configure the gaming console settings**

1. On your gaming console, navigate to the Video or Display settings.
2. Set the output resolution to "4K" or "2160p" to match your TV's settings.
3. You may also need to adjust other settings, such as the aspect ratio or screen format, to optimize the gaming experience.

**Step 6: Enjoy your gaming experience!**

1. Insert your Call of Duty game disc or download the game from the console's online store.
2. Start playing and enjoy the stunning 4K visuals on your new TV!

That's it! If you encounter any issues or have further questions, feel free to ask. Congratulations again on your new TV and gaming setup!
